Items.Title: Resolution approving the new designation and changes in the designation of certain organizations to receive funding in the Expense Budget.
Items.MatterName: Approving the new designation and changes in the designation of certain organizations to receive funding in the Expense Budget.

Items.Title: Resolution to establish that the discount percentage for early payment of real estate taxes be set at one-half of one percent per annum for Fiscal Year 2026.
Items.MatterName: Establish that the discount percentage for early payment of real estate taxes be set at one-half of one percent per annum for FY'26.

Items.Title: Resolution to establish that the interest rate be six percent per annum for Fiscal Year 2026 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of not more than $250,000, or not more than $250,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.
Items.MatterName: Establish that the interest rate be 6% per annum for FY'26 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of not more than $250,000, or not more than $250,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.

Items.Title: Resolution to establish that the interest rate be nine percent per annum for Fiscal Year 2026 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of more than $250,000 but less than or equal to $450,000, or more than $250,000 but less than or equal to $450,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.
Items.MatterName: Interest rate be 9% per annum for FY'26 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of more than $250,000 but less than or equal to $450,000, or more than $250,000 but less than or equal to $450,000 per residential unit.

Items.Title: Resolution to establish that the interest rate be sixteen percent per annum for Fiscal Year 2026 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of more than $450,000, or more than $450,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.
Items.MatterName: Establish that the interest rate be 16% per annum for FY'26 for non-payment of taxes on properties with an assessed value of more than $450,000, or more than $450,000 per residential unit for cooperative apartments.

Items.Title: Resolution to establish that the interest rate be two and one half percent per annum for Fiscal Year 2026 for  certain properties for which the owner has entered into an installment payment agreement with the department of finance for payment of delinquent property taxes, assessments, or other charges.
Items.MatterName: Interest rate be 2 1/2 % per annum for FY'26 for certain properties for which the owner has entered into an installment payment agreement with the dept of finance for payment of delinquent property taxes, assessments, or other charges.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of the East Harlem 125th Street business improvement district
Items.MatterName: East Harlem 125th Street Business Improvement District, Manhattan
